resources.string: Set max power saving freq in KHz (600MHz=600000KHz)
Do you want to invert partitions? Then it will autoreboot the device.
Switch internal memory with the external sd card. Reboot is required.
READ HERE IF SOMETHING IS NOT CLEAR.

13/06:
-Added OTA service, big thanks to KINGBABASULA
-Auto check for updates when you open app
-Fixed lmk value restoring on boot
-Code optimized
-Layout changes
-Translations updated
-Option to reset all to defaults
-Added night mode(only working on last cocore version)
-Updated some paths

01/06:
-Edited CPU layout, added min cpu frequency
-Fixed tcp congestion, edited layout
-Translations updated
-Added changelog
 -Code cleaned 

 06/08: 
-Added greek, portuguese translations 
-Fixed night mode 
-Layout changes 

 29/08: 
-Fixed wifi force close 
-If you open cpu fragment for first time, it will set 'ondemand' as default governor, 'noop' as default scheduler, 1 gHz and 100 mHz as default max and min frequencies

"
FSYNC: is an android capability that allows the system to write continuously data from ram to flash to avoid data loss due to a sudden shoutdown. It is enabled by default, if you have a stable system you can also disable it because it can improve performance (less writing by cpu, less battery using, better performance!) It's at your risk! 

 -SWEEPTOWAKE/TOUCHTOWAKE: these allow you to wake up your device by swiping/touching the screen when it is off. These features causes wakelock so you'll have a worse battery backup. 

 WIFI MODE: FAST or MAX MODE? FAST mode is used by default and it guarantee max wifi speed, instead of MAX mode that saves battery life and reduce wifi quality. 

 -TCP CONGESTIONS: these are about 3g speed, choose the one that is better for you, the best one is different due to the environment! 

 UKSM: stands for ULTRA KERNEL SAMEPAGE MERGING and in less words it reduce the use of ram by the system. 

 -SPI CRC: don't know exactly what is, but you'll have 10% performance more by disabling it. But be careful, it causes random crashes! 

 -REAL CHARGE NOTIFICATION: It shows if the battery is real charged or not. 

 -LOGGER: It disable or enable the system log capability, may speed system. 

 -SD AHEAD: Increase the cache size from 128kb to 2048 to improve the sd rw speed operations. 

 -S6E63M0 LCDCLK: It sets the screen refresh framerate, default is 60Hz.
Tap here to check it right now
